com.microsoft.band.tiles

Interface BandTileManager


  • public interface BandTileManager
    Manager for performing tile manipulation on a Microsoft Band through Microsoft Health's band communication service

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • addTile

        BandPendingResult<java.lang.Boolean> addTile(android.app.Activity activity,
                                           BandTile tile)
                                             throws BandIOException

        Method to add the given BandTile to the Microsoft Band if allowed by the user.

        This method waits for the user to respond to a custom AlertDialog and thus cannot be called from the Activity's main thread. The AlertDialog inherits its style from the application, and thus its appearance can be modified.

        Parameters:
        activity - Activity instance required for displaying the confirmation dialog
        tile - The given BandTile
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a Boolean return value representing whether the tile was added that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR, BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR, BandErrorType.BAND_FULL_ERROR, and BandErrorType.TILE_ALREADY_EXISTS_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the tile has more additional icons than allowed (8 for Microsoft Band and 13 for Microsoft Band 2)

      • getRemainingTileCapacity

        BandPendingResult<java.lang.Integer> getRemainingTileCapacity()
                                                              throws BandIOException
        Method to get the number of tiles that can be added to the Microsoft Band without any being removed
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with an Integer return value that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR and BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available

      • getTiles

        BandPendingResult<java.util.List<BandTile>> getTiles()
                                                     throws BandIOException
        Method to get a list of all the tiles on the Microsoft Band installed by the calling application
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a list of BandTiles return value that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR and BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available

      • removePages

        BandPendingResult<java.lang.Boolean> removePages(java.util.UUID tileId)
                                                 throws BandIOException
        Method to remove all pages from the tile with the given ID
        Parameters:
        tileId - The given ID
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a Boolean return value representing whether the pages were removed that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR, BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR, and BandErrorType.TILE_NOT_FOUND_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available

      • removeTile

        BandPendingResult<java.lang.Boolean> removeTile(BandTile tile)
                                                throws BandIOException
        Method to remove the tile represented by the given BandTile object from the Microsoft Band
        Parameters:
        tile - The given BandTile object
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a Boolean return value representing whether the tile was removed that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR, BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR, and BandErrorType.TILE_NOT_FOUND_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available

      • removeTile

        BandPendingResult<java.lang.Boolean> removeTile(java.util.UUID tileId)
                                                throws BandIOException
        Method to remove the tile with the given ID from the Microsoft Band
        Parameters:
        tileId - The given ID
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a Boolean return value representing whether the tile was removed that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR, BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR, and BandErrorType.TILE_NOT_FOUND_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available

      • setPages

        BandPendingResult<java.lang.Boolean> setPages(java.util.UUID tileId,
                                            PageData... info)
                                              throws BandIOException

        Method to instantiate pages in the tile with the given ID using the given PageData objects

        Only 8 pages can be instantiated at once and if one of the PageData objects' Page ID is the same as that of an existing page, that page will be updated rather than a new page being created.

        Parameters:
        tileId - The given ID
        info - The given PageData objects
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a Boolean return value representing whether the pages were added that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR, BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR, BandErrorType.TILE_NOT_FOUND_ERROR, and BandErrorType.INVALID_PAGE_DATA_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if passed PageData objects have invalid data
